definition: a person of virtue and prestige/a person of good moral standing and reputation
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards
15th day of month (lunar calendar)/old variant of 望[wang4]

sentences.english: This section about insects is written by a respectable specialist.

definition: to be advanced in both years and virtue (idiom)
to enjoy the confidence of the people/to be very popular
lit. Mount Tai and the North Star (idiom)/fig. an outstanding figure in one's field
